description:
The resolution that passed the Reverie and the incidents surrounding the conference stun people all over the world and corner the Seven Warlords of the Sea. Meanwhile, a Navy captain Koby secretly contacts someone who is currently in the Land of Wano.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Big News! An Incident That Will Affect the Seven Warlords!
Big News! Shichi Bukai o Osou Jiken
Grande nouvelle. Les Corsaires dans la tourmente !
Große Neuigkeiten! Der Vorfall, der die Sieben Samurai der Meere heimsucht
Большие новости! Инцидент, который затронет Шичибукаев!
大[ビッグ]ニュース! 七武海を襲う事件
